component.name: Female to Female jumper wire
component.purpose: Used to connect the sink node (RSS2 mote) to power pins and interrupt pins of the Electron modem
component.description: Jumper wires are simply wires that have connector pins at each end, allowing them to be used to connect two points to each other without soldering. Jumper wires are typically used with breadboards and other prototyping tools in order to make it easy to change a circuit as needed. Fairly simple. They are used in the LPG to connect the sink node to the to power male pins on the board and for interrupt signals via D1 pin
